title: Thursday Post Show (03-17-22)
itunes:title: Thursday Post Show (03-17-22)
description:
Bobby starts the show with his process of trying to remember bits that he wants to talk about. We get an update on the boxing match between Lunchbox and Scuba Steve. Bobby shares a way to relax during a big presentation. We also get an update on Scuba Steve’s Christmas present to Bobby and when we can expect Bobby to get it. Bobby talks about his favorite Marvel shows on Disney+. Someone also accuses Scuba Steve of being a psychopath.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
